body: Cooperating Association       Carver Birthplace Association (CBA) is a 501 c3 non-profit organization. Through your support of CBA, the association is able to assist the park with the following activities and programs:  Annual 4th Grade Carver Art & Essay Contest Carver Scholarship Outreach Educational materials Sponsorship of park special events The George Washington Carver Symposium Bookstore  Carver Connection Newsletter (Fall/Winter 2014 & 2015)
title: George Washington Carver National Monument: Cooperating Association
